mapper.select: select * from Orders where orderDate=#{orderDate} and serialNumber=(select max(serialNumber) from Orders where orderDate=#{orderDate})
select * from Orders where productId in(#{productIds})
select count(id) from Orders where validFlag=1

select top (#{itemsPerPage}) * from Orders where validFlag=1 and id>(select max(id) from (select top (#{startPosition}) id from Orders where validFlag=1 order by id) tt) order by ${orderingOption} ASC
select top (#{itemsPerPage}) * from Orders where validFlag=1 order by id ASC
SELECT year(orderDate) as 'year',month(orderDate) as 'month',count(1) as 'amount', productId FROM Orders where validFlag=1 group by productId, year(orderDate),month(orderDate)
mapper.update: update Orders set statusId = #{statusId} where id = #{id}
update Orders set validFlag = -1 where id = #{id}
